We have thought that Brother and Sister Wilson would make good laborers for this place, and are hoping that they will be inclined to come from New Zealand, and take up the burden here. If anything is to result from our work in Tasmania, the people must have patient instruction, line upon line and precept 


                                    -276- 

upon precept, here a little and there a little. What precious light and clear evidences we have concerning the truth for this time!
